242b4(mdo 'grel): zhes bgyi ba la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la zla ba byed bcabs pas/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la zla ba phyed bcabs pa de'i slad du dge 'dun las zla ba phyed spo ba gsol te/
242b5(mdo 'grel): dge 'dun gyis bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba la zla ba phyed bcabs pa de'i slad du zla ba phyed spo ba stsal bas zhag 'di snyed cig ni bgyis lags/ bgyi ba ni zhag 'di snyed cig mchis te/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
242b6(mdo 'grel): kyis bdag spo ba bgyid par gzung du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la che ge mo las byung ba'i
242b7(mdo 'grel): dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du dge 'dun las zhag drug mgu bar bgyi ba gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba che ge mo las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba de'i slad du zhag drug mgu bar bgyi ba stsal bas zhag 'di
243a1(mdo 'grel): snyed cig ni bgyis lags/ bgyi ba ni zhag 'di snyed cig mchis lags te/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis bdag mgu bar bgyi ba spyod par gzung du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge
243a2(mdo 'grel): slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba spo ba bgyid pas dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa/ mtshang 'bru bar bgyid pa/ 'thab mo bgyid pa/ 'gyed par bgyid pa/ rtsod par bgyid pa dag mchis zhes thos te/ de dag gis bdag la gzhi 'dis gleng bar 'gyur/ dran par bgyid par 'gyur
243a3(mdo 'grel): bas bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag gi mdun du spo ba slar gtang bar bgyi'o/ /phyir rgol pa mi mdza' ba de dag slar mchi nas yang spo ba blang bar bgyi'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis bdag rang bzhin du gnas par gzung du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ tshe dang ldan pa
243a4(mdo 'grel): dgongs su gsol/ bdag dge slong spo ba bgyid pa'i dgra bo dge slong mchis te/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba spo ba spyod pa bag yangs su bgyid cing slar yang len par bgyid do/ /yang blangs te spyod par bgyid na tshe dang ldan pa bdag ngo tsha ba ma mchis par mi gzung
243a5(mdo 'grel): du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ thabs yin no/ /legs so/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mgu bar bgyid pas/ dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa/ mtshang 'bru bar bgyid pa/ 'thab mo bgyid pa/ 'gyed par
243a6(mdo 'grel): bgyid pa/ rtsod par bgyid pa dag mchis zhes thos te/ de dag gis bdag la gzhi 'dis gleng bar 'gyur/ dran par bgyid par 'gyur bas bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag gi mdun du mgu bar bgyi ba slar gtad par bgyi'o/ /phyir rgol ba mi mdza' ba de dag slar
243a7(mdo 'grel): mchis na yang mgu bar bgyi ba blang bar bgyi'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis bdag rang bzhin du gnas par gzung du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ bdag dge slong mgu bar bgyi ba'i dgra bo dge slong mchis te/ bdag dge
243b1(mdo 'grel): slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mgu ba'i spyod pa bag yangs su bgyid cing slar yang len par bgyid do/ /yang blangs te spyod par bgyid na tshe dang ldan pas bdag ngo tsha ba ma mchis par mi gzung du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ thabs yin no/ /legs so/ /dge 'dun btsun pa
243b2(mdo 'grel): rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba spo ba bgyid pas dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa/ mtshang 'bru bar bgyid pa/ 'thab mo bgyid pa/ 'gyed par bgyid pa/ rtsod par bgyid pa dag mchi zhes thos te/ de dag gis bdag la gzhi 'dis gleng bar 'gyur/
243b3(mdo 'grel): dran par bgyid par 'gyur bas bdag gis de skad thos na dge slong rnams kyi mdun du spo ba slar gtang ba phyir rgol ba mi mdza' ba de dag slar mchis lags pas bdag spo ba yang slar len to/ /spo ba zhag ma 'khor ba rnams bgyi'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis bdag spo
243b4(mdo 'grel): ba bgyid par gzung du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba spo ba bgyid pa'i dgra bo dge slong mchis te/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas spo ba'i spyod pa bag yangs su bgyis pa dgra bo dge slong de dag slar mchis
243b5(mdo 'grel): lags pas bdag spo ba yang slar len to/ /spo ba zhag ma 'khor ba rnams bgyi'o/ /tshe dang ldan pas bdag spo ba bgyid par gzung du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ thabs yin no/ /legs so/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes
243b6(mdo 'grel): bgyi ba mgu bar bgyid pas dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa/ mtshang 'bru bar bgyid pa/ 'thab mo bgyid pa/ 'gyed par bgyid pa/ rtsod par bgyid pa dag mchis zhes thos te/ de dag gis bdag la gzhi 'dis gleng bar 'gyur/ dran par bgyid par 'gyur bas/ bdag
243b7(mdo 'grel): gis de skad thos nas dge slong rnams kyi mdun du mgu bar bgyi ba slar btang ba phyir rgol ba mi mdza' ba de dag slar mchis lags pas bdag mgu bar bgyi ba yang slar len to/ /mgu bar bgyi ba zhag ma 'khor ba rnams bgyi'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis bdag mgu
244a1(mdo 'grel): bar bgyid par gzung du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mgu ba bgyi ba'i dgra bo dge slong mchis te/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas mgu ba'i spyod pa bag yangs su bgyis pa dgra bo
244a2(mdo 'grel): dge slong de dag slar mchis lags pas bdag mgu bar bgyi ba yang slar len to/ /mgu bar bgyi ba zhag ma 'khor ba rnams bgyi'o/ /tshe dang ldan pas bdag mgu bar bgyid par gzung du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ thabs yin no/ /legs so/ /sa gzhan
244a3(mdo 'grel): na gnas pa'i spyod pa'i gzhi'o/ / //dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di ni glengs shing dran par bgyis kyang skabs 'byed du mi btub ste/ 'di dge slong rnams kyis smra bar mi bgyi ba nyid du rnam par gzhag cing mi
244a4(mdo 'grel): gdams par bgyis kyang skabs mi 'byed na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong gzhag par bgyi'o/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa
244a5(mdo 'grel): rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di glengs shing dran par bgyis kyang skabs 'byed du mi btub ste/ 'di dge slong rnams kyis smra bar mi bgyi ba nyid du rnam par gzhag cing mi gdams par bgyis kyang skabs mi 'byed de/ de'i slad du dge
244a6(mdo 'grel): 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong gzhag par bgyi na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong gzhag par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /'di ni las brjod pa dang po
244a7(mdo 'grel): ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong gzhag lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/
244b1(mdo 'grel): dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di glengs shing dran par bgyis kyang skabs 'byed du mi btub ste/ 'di dge slong rnams kyis smra bar mi bgyi ba nyid du rnam par gzhag cing mi gdams par bgyis kyang skabs mi 'byed na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang
244b2(mdo 'grel): bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye gzhag par bgyi'o/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di glengs shing dran par bgyis kyang skabs 'byed du mi btub ste/ 'di dge
244b3(mdo 'grel): slong rnams kyis smra bar mi 'gyur ba nyid du rnam par gzhag cing mi gnas par bgyis kyang skabs mi 'byed do/ /de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye gzhag par bgyi na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye gzhag par
244b4(mdo 'grel): bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye gzhag lags
244b5(mdo 'grel): te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /yongs su sbyang ba'i gzhi'o// //las bye ba dang / dge 'dun bye ba'i gzhi'i sdom la/ bzod pa gsol dang mthun pa dang / /gso sbyong gsol ba len 'jug pa'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/
244b6(mdo 'grel): bdag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong nang par snga zhig tu mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo'i lung la rnam par rtog rtog na 'di snyam du bgyid de/ gang las bdag cag las 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'bru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung pa'i gzhi ni 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngam ma byung ba dang /
244b7(mdo 'grel): gnas nas phyung ngam ma phyung ba lags na/ bdag cag la ltung ba byung gi ltung ba ma byung ba ma lags/ gnas nas phyung ba lags kyi gnas nas ma phyung ba ma lags te/ gang gnas nas phyung ba ni chos dang mthun pa'i phrin las ma 'khrugs par gzhag par mi 'os pa bgyis so snyam
245a1(mdo 'grel): bgyis nas/ bdag grong khyer yangs pa can gyi dge slong dang sdums bgyi zhing mthun par bgyi'o snyam ste/ bdag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong skra 'greng bar gyur/ skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid na/ 'byung bar bskyod pa mtshungs par nye bar
245a2(mdo 'grel): ston la mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing gzhi gang las gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad pa'i gzhi de las slar ldog par bgyid na/ thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad
245a3(mdo 'grel): lags pa la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'di skra 'greng bar gyur/ skra 'phyar par gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/ 'byung
245a4(mdo 'grel): bar bskyod/ mtshungs par nye bar ston la/ mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing gzhi gang las gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad pa'i gzhi de las slar ldog par bgyid na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig
245a5(mdo 'grel): dang / dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad pa'i gzhi de dag las slar ldog par bgyid/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang
245a6(mdo 'grel): dag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad do/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'di skra 'greng bar gyur/ skra 'phyar
245a7(mdo 'grel): par gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid/ 'byung bar bskyod/ mtshungs par nye bar ston la/ mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing gzhi gang las gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig /
245b1(mdo 'grel): gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa la bzod pa mdzad lags te/
245b2(mdo 'grel): 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong la dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pas bdag dge 'dun gyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol nas dge 'dun gyis bdag la bzod
245b3(mdo 'grel): pa mdzad lags te/ bdag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas pa mthun pa gsol na/ thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang
245b4(mdo 'grel): bcas pa la mthun pa stsal du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'di la dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pas 'di dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te bzod pa/ gsol nas/ dge 'dun
245b5(mdo 'grel): gyis 'di la bzod pa mdzad lags te/ kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas pa 'di mthun pa gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong bzod
245b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas pa 'di la mthun pa stsol to/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'di la dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pas 'di dge 'dun gyis gan du mchis te
245b7(mdo 'grel): bzod pa gsol nas/ dge 'dun gyis 'di la bzod pa mdzad lags te/ kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas pa 'di mthun pa gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas
246a1(mdo 'grel): pa 'di la mthun pa stsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas pa 'di la mthun pa stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /'di ni las brjod pa
246a2(mdo 'grel): dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas pa la mthun pa stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /dge
246a3(mdo 'grel): 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong la dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pas bdag dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te bzod pa gsol nas/ dge 'dun gyis bdag la bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/ bdag bzod
246a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas pa dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis nas mthun pa gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la mthun pa stsal lags pas/ bdag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa mthun pa stsal ba la mthun pa'i gso sbyong
246a5(mdo 'grel): gsol na/ thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa la mthun pa stsal ba la mthun pa'i gso sbyong stsal du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/
246a6(mdo 'grel): kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'di la dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pas/ 'di dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te bzod pa gsol nas/ dge 'dun gyis 'di la bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/ bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas
246a7(mdo 'grel): pa 'di/ dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis nas mthun pa gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa 'di la mthun pa stsal lags pas/ kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa mthun pa stsal ba 'di mthun pa'i gso sbyong gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun
246b1(mdo 'grel): gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa mthun pa stsal ba la mthun pa'i gso sbyong stsol to/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong
246b2(mdo 'grel): 'di la dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pas 'di dge 'dun gyi gan du mchis te/ bzod pa gsol nas/ dge 'dun gyis 'di la bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags te/ bzod pa'i phrin las mdzad lags pa 'khor dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi gan
246b3(mdo 'grel): du mchis nas mthun pa gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa 'di la mthun pa stsal lags pas/ kau shA m+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa mthun pa stsal pa 'di mthun pa'i gso sbyong gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong
246b4(mdo 'grel): 'khor dang bcas pa mthun pa stsal ba la mthun pa'i gso sbyong gsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa mthun pa stsal ba la mthun pa'i gso sbyong stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /'di
246b5(mdo 'grel): ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa la mthun pa stsal ba la mthun pa'i gso sbyong stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du
246b6(mdo 'grel): 'dzin to/ /las bye ba'i gzhi'o// //tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge sbyong gau ta ma ni sha za ste/ bdag cag gis sha bza' bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi de las srog chags gsod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /dge sbyong gau ta ma ni 'o ma 'thungs te/ bdag cag gis btung bar mi
246b7(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi de las be'u la gnod pa'i phyir ro/ /dge sbyong gau ta ma ni lan tshwa za ste/ bdag cag gis bza' bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khu ba las gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /dge sbyong go ta ma ni gos dras pa gyon te/ bdag cag gis bsgo bar mi bya'o/ /
247a1(mdo 'grel): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi de las dad pas sbyin par bya ba chud zos par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /dge sbyong gau ta ma ni dgon pa na gnas par byed de/ bdag cag ni grong du gnas par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi de las dad pas sbyin par bya ba yongs su ma spyad
247a2(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag las gang brtul zhugs kyi gnas lnga po 'di dag gis dag pa dang grol ba dang / nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa dang / bzod pa dang / legs par 'dzin pa des dge slong gau ta ma las ring du gyis shig /so sor gyis shig /
247a3(mdo 'grel): tha dad du gyis shig /rgyang srings shig /thag srings shig /logs shig tu 'dug cig /tshe dang ldan pa dag dge sbyong gau ta ma ni sha za ste/ bdag cag gis sha za bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi de las srog chags gsod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /dge sbyong gau ta ma
247a4(mdo 'grel): ni 'o ma 'thungs te/ bdag cag gis btung bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi de las be'u la gnod pa'i phyir ro/ /dge sbyong gau ta ma ni lan tshwa za ste/ bdag cag gis bza' bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khu ba las gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /dge sbyong gau ta ma ni gos dras pa gyon
247a5(mdo 'grel): te/ bdag cag gis bgo bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi de las dad pas sbyin par bya ba chud zos par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /dge sbyong gau ta ma ni dgon pa na gnas par byed de/ bdag cag ni grong du gnas par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi de las dad pas sbyin par bya ba
247a6(mdo 'grel): yongs su ma spyad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang dag khyed cag las gang brtul zhugs kyi gnas lnga po 'di dag gis dag pa dang / grol ba dang / nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa dang / bzod pa dang / legs par 'dzin pa des tshul shing long shig /'khor lo bye ba'i
247a7(mdo 'grel): gzhi'o/ / //rtsod pa'i gzhi'i sdom la/ gzu dang gsal dang sbed pa dang / /dge 'dun bsnyen gsum gnas brtan dang / /'drim dang dran dang ma smyos dang / /khyed dang de dag bdag 'dun bshags/ /ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba byung ba rnams mngon
247b1(mdo 'grel): sum gyis 'dul bas rnam par zhi bar byed par spro'am/ spro'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gzu bo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba byung ba rnams mngon sum gyis 'dul bas rnam par zhi bar bgyid par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing
247b2(mdo 'grel): bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis gzu bo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par bsko bar bgyi ste/ gzu bo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'dis dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba byung ba rnams mngon gsum gyis 'dul bas rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar
247b3(mdo 'grel): bgyid do/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gzu bo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba byung ba rnams rnam par zhi bar bgyid par spro ste/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par bsko na/
247b4(mdo 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa gang dag gzu bo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis gzu bo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar
247b5(mdo 'grel): bgyid par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba rnam par zhi bar byed par spro'am/ spro'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la
247b6(mdo 'grel): rtsod pa byung ba rnam par zhi bar bgyid par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di gsal bar bskos te/ gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba rnam par zhi bar
247b7(mdo 'grel): byed do/ 'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba rnam par zhi bar bgyid par spro ste/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par bsko na/ tshe dang
248a1(mdo 'grel): ldan pa gang dag gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di
248a2(mdo 'grel): rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba rnam par zhi bar byed par spro'am/ spro'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong gsal ba'i yang gsal ba ming
248a3(mdo 'grel): 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba rnam par zhi bar bgyid par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di gsal ba'i yang gsal bar bsko bar bgyi ste/ gsal ba'i yang
248a4(mdo 'grel): gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba rnam par zhi bar bgyid do/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ /gsal ba'i yang gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba rnam par zhi bar bgyid par spro ste/ de'i slad du
248a5(mdo 'grel): dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag gsal ba'i yang gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /
248a6(mdo 'grel): dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis gsal ba'i yang gsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbed par spro'am/ spro'o/ /
248a7(mdo 'grel): dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba 'di dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbed par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa sbed par bsko bar bgyi ste/ rtsod
248b1(mdo 'grel): pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bya ba 'di dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbed do/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbed par spro ste/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa sbed par bsko na/ tshe dang
248b2(mdo 'grel): ldan pa gang dag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa sbed par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa sbed par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi
248b3(mdo 'grel): gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ rtsod pa 'di gnas che ge mo zhes bgyi bar gang zag che ge mo zhes bgyi ba dang / ming ge mo zhes bgyi ba las gzhi 'di'i slad du byung nas yun 'di srid cig lags te/ rtsod pa 'di gzu bo rnams la phul
248b4(mdo 'grel): na gzu bo rnams kyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ de dag gis dge 'dun la phul nas dge 'dun gyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong gsal ba dag bskos na/ dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma
248b5(mdo 'grel): thog ste/ de dag gis dge slong gsal ba'i yang gsal ba dag bskos na dge slong gsal ba'i yang gsal ba de dag gis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ de dag gis gsal ba rnams la phul ba las/ gsal ba rnams kyis dge 'dun la phul nas dge 'dun gyis
248b6(mdo 'grel): bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa sbed par bskos te/ bdag rtsod pa sbed pa dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di/ gnas brtan dang bcas/ so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la dbul lo/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis rtsod pa 'di zla ba gsum gyi mtha'i
248b7(mdo 'grel): tshun chad kyis rnam par zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin pa dag gsan du gsol/ rtsod pa 'di gnas che ge mo zhes bgyi bar/ gang zag ga ge mo dang / ming ge mo zhes bgyi ba las gzhi 'di'i slad du rtsod pa byung nas yun
249a1(mdo 'grel): 'di srid gcig lags te/ rtsod pa 'di gzu bo rnams la phul na/ gzu bo rnams kyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ de dag gis dge 'dun la phul na dge 'dun gyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong gsal ba dag bskos na/
249a2(mdo 'grel): dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong gsal ba'i yang gsal ba dag bskos na dge slong gsal ba'i yang gsal ba de dag gis rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ de dag gis gsal ba rnams la phul ba las gsal ba rnams
249a3(mdo 'grel): kyis dge 'dun la phul nas dge 'dun gyis bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa sbed par bskos te/ bdag rtsod pa sbed pa dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di/ gnas brtan dang bcas/ so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi mtha' tshun chad du phul na/
249a4(mdo 'grel): gnas brtan dang bcas/ so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun gyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ des kyang bdag rtsod pa sbed pa dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la stsal nas/ bdag rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di/ mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa
249a5(mdo 'grel): dang / ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la dbul lo/ /mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin pa rnams kyis rtsod pa 'di zla ba drug gi mtha' tshun chad kyis rnam par zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ gnas brtan gsan du gsol/ rtsod pa 'di gnas che ge mo zhes bgyi bar/ gang zag ga
249a6(mdo 'grel): ge mo zhes bgyi ba dang / ming ge mo zhes bgyi ba las gzhi 'di'i slad du byung nas yun 'di srid cig lags te/ rtsod pa 'di gzu bo rnams la phul na gzu bo rnams kyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ de dag gis dge 'dun la phul nas dge 'dun gyis kyang rnam par zhi bar
249a7(mdo 'grel): bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong gsal ba dag bskos na/ dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ de dag gis dge slong gsal ba'i yang gsal ba bskos na/ dge slong gsal ba'i yang gsal ba de dag gis kyang rnam par zhi bar
249b1(mdo 'grel): bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ de dag gis gsal ba rnams la phul ba las/ gsal ba rnams kyis dge 'dun la phul nas/ dge 'dun gyis bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa sbed par bskos te/ bdag rtsod pa sbed pa dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di/ gnas brtan
249b2(mdo 'grel): dang bcas/ so sor thar ba dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi mtha' tshun chad du phul na/ des kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog ste/ des bdag rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la stsal nas/ bdag rtsod pa sbed pa dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di/ mdo sde 'dzin pa
249b3(mdo 'grel): dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la zla ba drug gi mtha' tshun chad du phul na de dag gis kyang rnam par zhi bar bgyid rngo ma thog nas/ de dag gis bdag rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la stsal nas/ bdag rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di
249b4(mdo 'grel): gnas brtan la 'bul lo/ gnas brtan gyis rtsod pa 'di thug pa ma mchis pa tshun chad kyis rnam pa zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun la tshul shing 'brim par spro'am/ spro'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi
249b5(mdo 'grel): ba 'di dge 'dun la tshul shing 'brim par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di tshul shing 'brim par bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong tshul shing 'brim pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
249b6(mdo 'grel): tshul shing 'brim mo/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la tshul shing 'brim par spro ste/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di tshul shing 'brim par bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag
249b7(mdo 'grel): dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di tshul shing 'brim par bsko bar mdzad pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di tshul shing 'brim par bskos lags te/
250a1(mdo 'grel): 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong gyad bu nor la dge slong ma mdza' mos yang dag pa ma lags pa gsob gsog brdzun gyis skur te/ bdag la dge slong dag gis gzhi 'dis
250a2(mdo 'grel): gleng bas bdag dge slong gyad bu nor dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol na/ thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong gyad bu nor la dran pas 'dul ba stsal du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
250a3(mdo 'grel): gsan du gsol/ dge slong gyad bu nor 'di la dge slong ma mdza' mos yang dag pa ma lags pa gsob gsog brdzun gyis skur te/ 'di la dge 'dun gyis gzhi des gleng bas dge slong gyad bu nor 'di dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol na gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing
250a4(mdo 'grel): bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong gyad bu nor 'di la dran pas 'dul ba stsol to/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong gyad bu nor 'di la dge slong ma mdza' mos yang dag pa ma lags pa gsob
250a5(mdo 'grel): gsog brdzun gyis skur te/ 'di la dge slong dag gis gzhi des gleng bas dge slong gyad bu nor 'di la dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyi dge slong gyad bu nor 'di la dran pas 'dul ba stsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong gyad bu nor 'di
250a6(mdo 'grel): la dran pas 'dul ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig /'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong gyad bu nor
250a7(mdo 'grel): la dran pas 'dul ba stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong bye ma skyes smyos pa sems 'khrugs pa sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas gzir bas dge sbyong gi tshul ma lags pa/ rjes su mthun
250b1(mdo 'grel): pa ma lags pa/ rung ba ma lags pa/ tshul dang mthun pa ma lags pa mang du spyod cing smras te stsal nas mig 'gyur/ kha chu zags/ bzhin bsgyur/ sa la 'gres ldogs/ gnyid kyis ma log kyang gnyid kyis log pa ltar bcos/ ma smyos kyang smyos pa ltar bcos/ smra bar ma bsams
250b2(mdo 'grel): kyang smras te/ bdag gis dran pa rnyed na bdag la dge slong rnams kyis gzhi des gleng bas bdag dge slong bye ma skyes dge 'dun la ma smyos pas 'dul ba gsol na/ thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong bye ma skyes la ma smyos pas 'dul ba
250b3(mdo 'grel): stsal du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong bye ma skyes smyos pa sems 'khrugs pa sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas gzir ba 'dis dge sbyong gi tshul ma lags pa/ rjes su mthun pa ma lags pa/ rung ba ma lags pa/ tshul dang
250b4(mdo 'grel): mthun pa ma lags pa mang du spyad cing smras te stsal nas mig 'gyur/ kha chu zags/ bzhin bsgyur/ sa la 'gres ldogs/ gnyid kyis ma log kyang gnyid kyis log pa ltar bcos/ ma smyos kyang smyos pa ltar bcos/ smra bar ma bsams kyang smras te/ 'dis dran pa rnyed na 'di la dge
250b5(mdo 'grel): slong rnams kyis gzhi des gleng bas dge slong bye ma skyes 'di dge 'dun las ma smyos par 'dul ba gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong bye ma skyes la ma smyos pas 'dul ba stsol to/ /'di ni gsol
250b6(mdo 'grel): ba'o/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong bye ma skyes smyos pa sems 'khrugs pa/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas gzir ba 'dis dge sbyong gi tshul ma lags pa/ rjes su mthun pa ma lags pa/ rung ba ma lags pa/ tshul dang mthun pa ma lags pa/ mang du spyad cing
250b7(mdo 'grel): smras te stsal nas mig 'gyur/ kha chu zags/ bzhin bsgyur/ sa la 'gres ldogs/ gnyid kyis ma log kyang gnyis kyis log pa ltar bcos/ ma smyos kyang smyos pa ltar bcos/ smra bar ma bsams kyang smras te/ 'dis dran pa rnyed na 'di la dge slong rnams kyis gzhi des gleng bas dge
251a1(mdo 'grel): slong bye ma skyes 'di dge 'dun las ma smyos pas 'dul ba gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong bye ma skyes la ma smyos pas 'dul ba gsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong bye ma skyes la ma smyos pas/ 'dul ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig /
251a2(mdo 'grel): gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong bye ma skyes la ma smyos pas 'dul ba stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin
251a3(mdo 'grel): to/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas 'thab par gyur/ mtshang 'bru bar gyur/ rtsod par gyur/ 'gyed par gyur cing gnas te/ phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs su rnam par gnas pa ni bdag cag gis ma rnyed de/ rnyed pa
251a4(mdo 'grel): ma yin no/ /nyes pa rnyed kyi legs par rnyed pa ni ma yin no/ /kha na ma tho ba sbom po dang / khyim na gnas pa la ston pa ma gtogs par gzhi 'di las khyod la ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa dang / bdag la ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa de dag tshe dang ldan pa gang dag gi mdun du mthol ba dang /
251a5(mdo 'grel): 'chags pa dang / mi 'chab par bdag spro'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas 'thab par gyur/ mtshang 'bru bar gyur/ rtsod par gyur/ 'gyed par gyur cing gnas te/ phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs su rnam par gnas pa
251a6(mdo 'grel): ni bdag cag gis ma rnyed de/ rnyed pa ma yin no/ /nyes pa rnyed kyis legs pa ma rnyed de/ kha na ma tho ba sbom po dang / khyim na gnas pa la ston pa ma gtogs par gzhi 'di las khyed cag la ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa dang / bdag la ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa de dag tshe dang ldan pa dag gi
251a7(mdo 'grel): mdun du bdag mthol lo/ /bshags so/ /mi 'chab bo/ /mthol zhing bshags na bdag bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur ro/ /ma mthol ma bshags na ni mi 'gyur ro/ /lan gsum du bzlas/ ltung ba mthong ngam/ mthong ngo / /phyin cad sdom mam/ sdom mo/ /lan gsum du bzlas/
251b1(mdo 'grel): rtsod pa'i gzhi'o// //gnas mal gyi gzhi dang nye ba'i gzhi'i sdom la/ gnas khang zas la bsko ba gnyis/ /thug pa bag chos 'brim pa gnyis/ /phran tshegs 'brim par byed pa gnyis/ /snod spyad 'brub pa dang gos kyi gnyis/ /dbyar gyi ras chen sped dang 'gyed/ /mngag gzhug pa dang
251b2(mdo 'grel): mdzes chos te/ /gang zag bcu dang gnyis po dag /ston pas yang dag bshad pa yin/ /lag gi bla dang lag dpon dang / /'khar ba dang ni dra ba'o/ /ming 'di zhes bgyi ba khyod dge slong lhags pa lhags pa rnams la gnas khang bsko bar spro'am/ spro'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du
251b3(mdo 'grel): gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong lhags pa lhags pa rnams la gnas khang bsko bar spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba gnas khang bsko bar spro bar bgyi ste/
251b4(mdo 'grel): dge slong ming zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong lhags pa lhags pa rnams la gnas khang bsko'o/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong lhags pa lhags pa rnams la gnas khang bsko bar spro ste/ dge slong ming 'di
251b5(mdo 'grel): zhes bgyi ba'i 'di gnas khang bsko bar spro na tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba gnas khang bsko bar bsko ba bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di
251b6(mdo 'grel): zhes bgyi ba 'di gnas khang bsko bar bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge slong rnams la zas la bsko bar spro'am/ spro'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la zas
251b7(mdo 'grel): la bsko bar spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la zas la bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la zas la bsko'o/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun
252a1(mdo 'grel): btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la zas la bsko bar spro ste dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la zas la bsko bar bskos na tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la
252a2(mdo 'grel): zas la bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong rnams la zas la bsko bar bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du
252a3(mdo 'grel): 'dzin to/ /ming 'di zhes bya ba khyed dge slong rnams la thug pa 'brim par spro'am/ spro'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la thug pa 'brim par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang
252a4(mdo 'grel): bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun rnams la thug pa 'brim par bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la thug pa 'brim mo/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong
252a5(mdo 'grel): ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la thug pa 'brim par spro ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la thug pa 'brim par bsko na tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la thug pa 'brim par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma
252a6(mdo 'grel): gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la thug pa 'brim par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod
252a7(mdo 'grel): dge slong rnams la bag chos 'brim par spro'am/ spro'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ /dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la bag chos 'brim par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge
252b1(mdo 'grel): 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la bag chos 'brim par bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la bag chos 'brim mo/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong
252b2(mdo 'grel): rnams la bag chos 'brim par spro ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la bag chos 'brim par bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la bag chos 'brim par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig /gang dag mi
252b3(mdo 'grel): bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig / dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la bag chos 'brim par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge slong rnams la phran tshegs
252b4(mdo 'grel): 'brim par spro'am/ spro'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la phran tshegs 'brim par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming
252b5(mdo 'grel): 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la phran tshegs 'brim par bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la phran tshegs 'brim mo/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la
252b6(mdo 'grel): phran tshegs 'brim par spro ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la phran tshegs 'brim par bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la phran tshegs 'brim par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig /gang dag mi bzod pa
252b7(mdo 'grel): de dag ni gsungs shig / dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong rnams la phran tshegs 'brim par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'drub par
253a1(mdo 'grel): spro'am/ spro'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'drub par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes
253a2(mdo 'grel): bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'drub par bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad du 'drub bo/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'drub par spro ste/ dge slong ming
253a3(mdo 'grel): 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'drub par bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'drub par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang
253a4(mdo 'grel): nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'drub par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par spro'am/ spro'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
253a5(mdo 'grel): gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gyi dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed
253a6(mdo 'grel): pa sbed par bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed do/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par spro ste/ dge slong ming 'di
253a7(mdo 'grel): zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis
253b1(mdo 'grel): bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsungs bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa 'ged par spro'am/ spro'o/ /dge 'dun
253b2(mdo 'grel): btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyis rnyed pa 'ged par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos
253b3(mdo 'grel): kyi rnyed pa 'ged par bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa 'ged do/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa 'ged par spro ste/ dge
253b4(mdo 'grel): slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa 'ged par spro na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa 'ged par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /
253b5(mdo 'grel): dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar dge 'dun gyi gos kyi rnyed pa 'ged par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbed par spro'am/
253b6(mdo 'grel): spro'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbed par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di
253b7(mdo 'grel): dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbed par bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbed do/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi pa 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras
254a1(mdo 'grel): chen sbed par spro ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbed par bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbed par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs
254a2(mdo 'grel): shig / dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbed par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen 'ged par spro'am/ spro'o/ /dge 'dun
254a3(mdo 'grel): btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen 'ged par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen 'ged
254a4(mdo 'grel): par bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen 'ged do/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen 'ged par spro ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di
254a5(mdo 'grel): dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen 'ged par bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen 'ged par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge
254a6(mdo 'grel): 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyar gyi gos ras chen 'ged par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /ming 'di zhes bgyi ba khyod dge 'dun gyi mngag gzhug par spro'am/ spro'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong
254a7(mdo 'grel): ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mngag gzhug par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mngag gzhug par bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge
254b1(mdo 'grel): 'dun gyi mngag gzhug par bgyid do/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mngag gzhug par spro ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mngag gzhug par bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes
254b2(mdo 'grel): bgyi ba 'di mngag gzhug par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mngag gzhug par bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de
254b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin du 'dzin to/ /ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi mdzes 'chos su spro'am/ spro'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mdzes 'chos su spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod
254b4(mdo 'grel): cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mdzes 'chos su bsko bar bgyi ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mdzes 'chos bgyid do/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun
254b5(mdo 'grel): gyi mdzes 'chos su spro ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mdzes 'chos su bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mdzes 'chos su bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis
254b6(mdo 'grel): bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi mdzes 'chos su bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /sder spyad 'brim pa dang / gnas mal 'bogs pa dang / gnas mal byi bo 'bogs pa dang / shing tog 'brim pa dang /
254b7(mdo 'grel): chu'i zhal ta ba dang / bang rim gyi zhal ta ba dang / sgye'u cung srung ba dang / sra brkyang sbed pa dag ni las snga ma dag gi khongs su 'dus so/ /ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod lag gi blar spro'am/ spro'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di lag gi blar spro na/ gal
255a1(mdo 'grel): te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di lag gi blar bsko bar bgyid de/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba lag gi blar bgyid do/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
255a2(mdo 'grel): gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di lag gi blar spro ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di lag gi blar bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di lag gi blar bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /
255a3(mdo 'grel): dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di lag gi blar bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /lag pod ni lag gi bla'i khongs su 'dus so/ /gnas mal gyi gzhi'o// //dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/
255a4(mdo 'grel): bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod de/ dge 'dun las 'khar ba gnang ba gsol na/ thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rgas 'khogs shing
255a5(mdo 'grel): nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod pa la 'khar ba gnang ba stsal du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal ba sbyor mi bzod pa 'di dge 'dun las 'khar ba gnang ba gsol
255a6(mdo 'grel): na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod pa la 'khar ba gnang ba stsol to/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan
255a7(mdo 'grel): du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod de/ dge 'dun la 'khar ba gnang ba gsol na/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod la 'khar ba'i gnang ba
255b1(mdo 'grel): gsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod la 'khar ba gnang ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun
255b2(mdo 'grel): gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod pa la 'khar pa gnang ba stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung pas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba rgas 'khogs
255b3(mdo 'grel): shing nyam chung ba bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod de/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams las dra ba gnang ba gsol na/ thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod pa la dra ba gnang
255b4(mdo 'grel): ba stsal du gsol/ lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod pa 'di dge 'dun las dra ba gnang ba gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar
255b5(mdo 'grel): mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod pa la dra ba gnang ba stsol to/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing
255b6(mdo 'grel): sbyor mi bzod de/ dge 'dun las dra ba gnang ba gsol na/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod pa la dra ba gnang ba gsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal
255b7(mdo 'grel): zhing sbyor mi bzod pa la dra ba gnang ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung la bro 'tshal zhing sbyor mi bzod pa la dra ba gnang ba stsal
256a1(mdo 'grel): lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /'khar ba dang dra ba gnyis ka'i gnang ba sbyin pa ni las snga ma gnyis ka'i khongs su 'dus so/ /gnas mal gyi gzhi dang nye ba'i gzhi'o// //las kyi grangs brgya rtsa gcig tu nges par gang las shes she na/ gtam gyi gzhi
256a2(mdo 'grel): las las kyi grangs brjod pa la/ btsun pa las dag tu mchis/ nye ba 'khor brgya rtsa gcig go /btsun pa las du dag gis las thams cad bsdus/ nye ba 'khor gsum gyis te/ gsum gang zhe na/ gsol ba'i las dang / gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis so/ / btsun pa las
256a3(mdo 'grel): brgya rtsa gcig po gang dag lags pa de dag ni gsol ba'i las dag ni du/ gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las dag ni du/ gsol ba dang bzhi'i las dag ni du mchis bka' stsal pa nye ba 'khor/ gsol ba'i las ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o/ /gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las ni bzhi bcu rtsa bdun no/ /gsol ba dang bzhi'i
256a4(mdo 'grel): las ni sum cu'o zhes gsungs so/ /de las gsol ba'i las nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ gal te gsang ste ston pa'i slob dpon gyis bar chad kyi chos rnams gsang ste dri ba'i phyir gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / las byed pa'i slob dpon gyis bar chad kyi chos rnams dge 'dun gyi nang du dri
256a5(mdo 'grel): ba'i phyir gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa'i phyir gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / gso sbyong de la dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba dang bcas par gyur na gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / gso sbyong gi tshe ltung ba de la dge 'dun thams cad
256a6(mdo 'grel): yid gnyis dang bcas par gyur na gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / gso sbyong gi tshe dge 'dun ltung ba'i phyir rtsod par gyur na gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / gso sbyong gi tshe ltung ba de ni gang yin pa de las ji ltar ni ldang bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pas nyes pa nyid ma
256a7(mdo 'grel): yin par gyur na de'i tshe gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / dgag dbye bya ba'i phyir gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / dgag dbye de la dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba dang bcas par gyur na gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / dgag dbye'i tshe ltung ba de la dge 'dun thams cad yid
256b1(mdo 'grel): gnyis dang bcas par gyur na gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / dgag dbye'i tshe dge 'dun ltung ba'i phyir rtsod par gyur na gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / dgag dbye'i tshe ltung ba de ni gang yin de las ji ltar ni ldang bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pas nges pa nyid ma yin
256b2(mdo 'grel): par gyur na de'i tshe gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / dbyar gnas par khas blang ba'i tshe gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / shi ba'i rdzas dang / shi ba'i nor dang 'dra pa'i gang zag byin gyis brlab pa la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyis
256b3(mdo 'grel): chos gos sra brkyang de gding ba'i dge slong la gtad pa dang / gyad bu nor lta bu chos gos gsum ngan pa la dge 'dun gyis ras yug chen sbyin pa la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / dge slong dang dge slong ma gang dag ji ltar skye bo phal po che'i tshogs ma dad par rig par 'gyur ba de
256b4(mdo 'grel): lta de ltar khyim rnams su spyod par byed pa khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed du gzhug pa la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / ngor 'phya ba'i grangs su gzhug pa la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / gzhogs 'phyas byed ba'i grangs su gzhug pa la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las
256b5(mdo 'grel): bya ba dang / bsgo ba rna la gzon pa'i grangs su gzhug pa la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / cang mi smra bas rna la gzon pa'i grangs su gzhug pa la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / sbyin bdag longs spyod 'gribs pa'i khyim du zan mi bza' ba'i sdom pa sbyin pa la gsol ba 'ba'
256b6(mdo 'grel): zhig gi las bya ba dang / khyim gyi sdom pa byin pa de nyid gzhig pa la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / khyim bdag dge slong la yang dag pa ma yin pas skur ba 'debs pa'i khyim du lhung bzed khas dbub pa la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba dang / lhung bzed khas phub pa de nyid bzod pa
256b7(mdo 'grel): gsol ba'i khyim du de nyid bzlog par bya ba la gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ba'o/ /gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bzhi bcu rtsa bdun gang zhe na/ gso sbyong gi gnas la blo mthun par bya ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dkyil 'khor ba dang / mtshams chen po gcad pa dang / mtshams
257a1(mdo 'grel): bu chung bcad pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / mtshams chen po bcad pa'i nang du chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge slong smyos shing sems 'khrug pa las kyi gnas su rad rod byed pa mi
257a2(mdo 'grel): mthun par mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyis las bya ba dang / dbyar gnas par khas len pa rnams la gnas mal stobs pa'i dge slong bsko ba la gsol ba dang
257a3(mdo 'grel): gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / rung ba'i khang pa la blo mthun par bya ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang la blo mthun par bya ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding ba'i dge slong bsko ba la gsol
257a4(mdo 'grel): ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / lag gi bla dang lag pod bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / gnas khang bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / zas la bsko bar bsko ba la gsol
257a5(mdo 'grel): ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / thug pa 'brim pa bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / bag chos 'brim pa bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / phran tshegs 'brim pa bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / snod spyad 'brim pa bsko ba la gsol ba
257a6(mdo 'grel): dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dbyar gyi gos kyi rnyed pa sbed pa bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dbyar gyi gos kyi rnyed pa 'gyed pa bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbed pa bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /
257a7(mdo 'grel): dbyar gyi gos ras chen 'gyed pa bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / mngag gzhug par bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / mdzes 'chos bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba mngon sum gyis 'dul ba'i gzu
257b1(mdo 'grel): bo bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ba gzu bos zhi bar ma nus na dge 'dun nam gzu bo rnams kyis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa'i gang zag gsal ba dang gsal ba'i yang gsal ba bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge 'dun la rtsod
257b2(mdo 'grel): pa byung ba gang zag gsal ba dang gsal ba'i yang gsal bas zhi bar ma nus te dge 'dun la phul ba na dge 'dun gyis rtsod pa sbed pa'i gang zag bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge 'dun rtsod pa byung ba'i tshe tshul shing 'brim pa'i gang zag bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi
257b3(mdo 'grel): las bya ba dang / dge slong khang pa'i gzhi rung ba bstan par gsol ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge slong gtsug lag khang gi gzhi rung ba bstan pa gsol ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge slong khyim sun 'byin pa la dge sbyong gi chos ma yin pa rnam pa mang pos gleng
257b4(mdo 'grel): ba'i gang zag bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / rgan po dang nad pa la chos gos snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge slong lag gi bla la lo drug tshun chad du stan gyi gnang ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba
257b5(mdo 'grel): dang / lhung bzed 'brel pa med par 'brim pa'i gang zag bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge slong dang dge slong ma skye bo phal po che ma dad par rig par 'gyur ba de ltar khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pa'i gang zag bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge slong ma'i
257b6(mdo 'grel): ston pa bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / so sor bshags pa'i nyes pa spang pa'i phyir gang zag nags nyul ba bsko ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge slong dge 'dun gyi gnas nas phyung ba la dge slong mas phyag bya ba'i 'os ma yin pa'i sdom pa sbyin pa la gsol ba dang
257b7(mdo 'grel): gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge slong ma 'khor skyong nus pa la 'khor nye bar 'jog pa'i gnang ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge slong ma 'khor skyong nus pa dang lo bcu gnyis lon pa la 'khor mang po nye bar 'jog pa'i gnang ba sbyin pa la gsol pa dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /
258a1(mdo 'grel): dge slong rgan po dang nad pa la 'khar ba gnang ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge slong rgan po dang na ba la dra ba gnang ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / gtsug lag khang mtshams tha dad pa gnyis kyi rnyed pa gcig tu bya ba la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba
258a2(mdo 'grel): dang / dge slong ma'i bslab pa'i sdom pa sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge slong ma bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba la tshangs par spyod pa la nye bar gnas pa'i sdom pa sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge slong ma bu dang lhan cig khyim gcig na nyal ba'i gnang ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang
258a3(mdo 'grel): gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dge slong ma mu ge'i sdug bsngal byung ba'i tshe nye du rnams dang lhan cig 'brel ba'i nye bar spyod pa'i gnang ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba dang / dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa dge 'dun gyi tshad la zhag bzhi bcu mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro ba'i gnang ba sbyin pa la
258a4(mdo 'grel): gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya ba'o/ /gsol ba dang bzhi'i las sum cu gang zhe na/ dge slong dang dge slong ma bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / mu stegs can rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa zla ba bzhi'i bar du mkhan pos sbyar pa'i gos kyi gnas pa sbyin pa la gsol ba dang
258a5(mdo 'grel): bzhi'i las bya ba dang / dkyil 'khor ba dang / mtshams chen po dang / mtshams bu chung dgrol ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / gnas nas phyung ba bzod pa'i las byas pa mthun pa sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / mthun pa byin pa la mthun pa'i gso sbyong sbyin pa la
258a6(mdo 'grel): gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / nan tur gyi las bsdigs pa dang / smad pa dang / bskrad pa dang / phyir 'gyed pa dang / ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba dang / phyir mi 'chos pas gnas nas dbyung ba dang / sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong bas gnas nas dbyung ba dang / gso sbyong
258a7(mdo 'grel): gzhag pa dang / dgag dbye gzhag par bya ba dag la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / de dag la bzod pa bya ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / bya ba dag la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / spo ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / gzhi nas spo ba sbyin pa la gsol
258b1(mdo 'grel): ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba la gsol
258b2(mdo 'grel): ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / sra brkyang dbyung ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / ma smyos pas 'dul pa sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug pa sbyin la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / dge
258b3(mdo 'grel): 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / de'i rjes su phyogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / khyim sun 'byin pa bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / bka' blo mi bde ba bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang
258b4(mdo 'grel): bzhi'i las bya ba dang / dge slong dang dge tshul sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong ma bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / dge slong ma dkon mchog gtong ba
258b5(mdo 'grel): bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / dge slong ma 'thab krol byed pa bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / dge slong ma sde zhing gnas pa bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / dge slong ma sde zhing gnas su 'dzud pa bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo
258b6(mdo 'grel): ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / dge tshul sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba bsnyil ba la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba dang / pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba byung ba la bslab pa sbyin pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ba'o/ /las rnams kyi bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni 'di dag yin te/ gsang dang
258b7(mdo 'grel): nang du dri phyir dang / gso sbyong de la ltung bcas dang / /de la dge 'dun yid gnyis dang / /rtsod dang nges nyid ma yin dang / /de yi don du lnga po dag /thams cad dgag dbyer gtogs pa yin/ /dbyar gnas khas blangs nyid dang ni/ /shi ba'i rdzas dang nor 'dra dang / /chos gos sra brkyang gtad pa dang / /chos gos sbyin par
259a1(mdo 'grel): bya ba dang / /gnas ngan len ni brjod pa dang / /grangs su gzhug pa bzhi dag dang / /khyim gyi sdom dang de gzhig dang / /lhung bzed khas dbub bya ba dang / /de nyid bzlog par bya ba dag /gsol ba 'ba' zhig las yin no/ /gnas dang mtshams ni gsum po dang / /mi 'bral smyos dang dgag dbye dang / /
259a2(mdo 'grel): gnas mal stobs par byed pa dang / /rung ba'i sa gzhi bsgo ba dang / /sra brkyang dang ni de 'ding dang / /spong dang lag gi bla dang ni/ /gnas khang bsko la sogs pa dang / /gzu dang gsal dang sbed pa dang / /tshul shing 'brim par byed pa dang / /khang pa khang chen bstan pa dang / /gleng dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur dang / /
259a3(mdo 'grel): stan dang lhung bzed 'brim pa dang / /ma dad go bar bya ba dang / /ston pa dang ni nags nyul dang / /phyag mi bya dang mang phyir dang / /'khar ba dra ba'i phyir dang ni/ /rnyed pa gcig tu bya phyir dang / /bslab pa sbyin dang nye gnas dang / /bu dang nye du'i phyir 'gro ba/ /gsol ba gnyis kyi las yin no/ /bsnyen
259a4(mdo 'grel): par rdzogs par bya ba dang / /mu stegs gnas dang mtshams dgrol dang / /mthun sbyin gso sbyong bdun po dag /brgya dang dran dang ma smyos dang / /de nyid tshol du gzhug pa dang / /bsgo par bya ba rnams dang ni/ /nyams pa sbyin par bya ba dag /gsol dang bzhi yi las
259a5(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /las brgya rtsa gcig pa/ 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra pa'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa chen po bram ze'i btsun pa slob dpon yon tan 'od bdag dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' rgya mtsho'i pha rol du son pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba bdud rtsi'i nying khus shes
259a6(mdo 'grel): rab kyi dbang po rgyas pa bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' dam pa nan tan snying por bsgrubs pa/ sde pa thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i sde snod mtha' dag gi gtso bor gyur pa/ 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba kun las btus pa rdzogs so// //dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag dpal lha
259a7(mdo 'grel): btsan po'i bka' lung gis 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa kha che'i bye brag tu smra ba'i slob dpon dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ 'di la sh+lo ka ni sum stong bdun brgya yod/ bam po ni dgur byas so// //
